entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 16 March 2023
